p:
Shortlisted conserved regions from the structural polyprotein were explored for their ability to act as B cell epitopes. Full length amino acid sequence of structural polyprotein of Chikungunya virus (strain S27-African prototype) (UniProt ID: Q8JUX5) was subjected to linear B cell epitope prediction analysis available at Immune epitope database (IEDB)
42 . The analysis was performed using three different prediction algorithms namely, Bipipred, Emini surface accessibility and Kolaskar and Tongaonkar with default algorithm parameters.
